maml:description.maml:para: Connect to a SMA server. This command generates an access token to be used during the same session. This token has an expiration of 1 hour, after which you must authenticate again.

maml:Description.maml:para: The FQDN of the appliance. Must begin with `https://`
The SMA org to connect to.
The credentials of the user authenticating to the SMA Server
The credentials of the user authenticating to the SMA Server
The SMA org to connect to.
The FQDN of the appliance. Must begin with `https://`

command:example.maml:title: -------------------------- Example 1 --------------------------
command:example.dev:code:
PS C:\> Connect-SmaServer -Server 'https://kace.example.com' -Org 'Default' -Credential (Get-Credential)
Server Org Status Protocol User ------ ---- ------ -------- ---- kace.example.com Default Connected HTTPS my_user

dev:remarks.maml:para: Connects to the default org of a Kace SMA Server.
